thread.title: MEDIA ALERT: NETSCOUT to Demonstrate Service Assurance Solutions for Visibility, Insight, Innovation and Security at SCTE Cable-Tec Expo 2015
thread.title_full: MEDIA ALERT: NETSCOUT to Demonstrate Service Assurance Solutions for Visibility, Insight, Innovation and Security at SCTE Cable-Tec Expo 2015

author: admin
title: MEDIA ALERT: NETSCOUT to Demonstrate Service Assurance Solutions for Visibility, Insight, Innovation and Security at SCTE Cable-Tec Expo 2015
text:
NetScout Systems, Inc. 
NEW ORLEANS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Today at the Society of Cable Telecommunications Engineers (SCTE) Cable-Tec Expo® 2015, NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC. (NASDAQ:NTCT), a market leader in service assurance and cybersecurity solutions, announced that it will demonstrate how the NETSCOUT nGeniusONE ® Service Assurance platform, recently consolidated with the Tektronix IRIS Traffic Analyzer, Arbor Networks DDoS protection and network security solutions and Fluke Networks WiFi analyzer and software, delivers Cable operation teams a comprehensive suite of tools for achieving extraordinary service quality and a flawless user experience at the conference. 
WHEN: 
October 13-16, 2015 in New Orleans, Louisiana, Booth #2927 
WHAT: 
NETSCOUT will demonstrate and discuss how its Service Assurance tools provide Cable operators with a comprehensive, end-to-end solution for achieving visibility, insight, innovation and security throughout the network. 
As Guardians of the Connected World, NETSCOUT supplies customers with time-sensitive actionable intelligence based on the traffic carried across their networks so that they can drive a better return on their infrastructure investments, reduce the tangible risks associated with downtime and ensure a high-quality user experience. Because the world today hinges on the flow of information, NETSCOUT helps customers’ ensure that ‘There is no Off’ for their network. NETSCOUT’s solutions enable customers to take a proactive approach to managing their systems and keeping them running smoothly. As a result, customers can innovate with confidence to take advantage of technology advances while delivering capital and operational savings along with a high-quality end-user experience. 
About NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC. 
NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC. (NASDAQ:NTCT) is a market leader in real-time service assurance and cybersecurity solutions for today’s most demanding service provider, enterprise and government networks. NETSCOUT’s Adaptive Service Intelligence (ASI) technology continuously monitors the service delivery environment to identify performance issues and provides insight into network-based security threats, helping teams to quickly resolve issues that can cause business disruptions or impact user experience. NETSCOUT delivers unmatched service visibility and protects the digital infrastructure that supports our connected world. To learn more, visit www.netscout.com .
